overview: • Co-founder of Quintessentially (UK) Limited and Group Commercial Director. Responsible for all aspects of the Quintessentially’s operations, including particularly systems and infrastructure design and implementation, operational strategy and the Member Assistance Team, as well as all major commercial matters, as and when they arise. • Qualified as a solicitor in 1997 and worked for Norton Rose from 1997 to 2000, specialising in private company and commercial law. • Director of Quintessentially (UK) Limited. • Graduate in Law from Oxford University
